price: 42. Hinnak Nabiyow usun uma mala koh malsaanam faxaanaa? Tokkel koroosite mari, ken uma mala keenil taduure.
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
